data.title: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud
data.meta_description: AI-Powered Integration of Data Protection and Cybersecurity.
data.text:
This update features: * New Acronis Advanced packs * Updates on the billing metrics display used * New and simplified way to add an Acronis server * Additional support to modify service templates' settings as well as make changes between products with different setup * Updated Client area that provides a more seamless experience * Additional bug fixes

Important note This release brings significant updates in the billing metrics. Prior to upgrading, run a pre-check as explained in https://kb.acronis.com/content/70916. Also note that based on the pre-check result, you might need to update your Acronis product configuration in WHMCS. Post-upgrade, run the following maintenance tasks to ensure that the module works smoothly:

Go to the add-on modules admin screen (System Settings → Addon Modules) to allow the integration to finalize the upgrade.

Run a Template Cache cleanup (Utilities → System → System Cleanup) to ensure all new offering items are properly displayed on the product configuration screen.

Manually run all cron jobs to make sure that the new billing metrics are properly synchronized with the usage reports.

After upgrading to WHMCS 2.7, the Advanced packs pricing has to be reconfigured since this release updates the offering items.

What's new

New Acronis products support

Advanced Data Loss Prevention pack support has been added. DLP Advanced pack is currently available as EAP (Early Access Program). Learn more from the Acronis website in https://www.acronis.com/en-us/products/cloud/cyber-protect/data-loss-prevention/.

Billing metrics and usage updates

Added new billing metrics for own service provider storage. You can now bill separately your own storage and the one, registered by your partner. The new available metrics are as follows:

Cyber Protection (per GB) - Service Provider storage

Cyber Protection (per workload) - Service Provider storage

File Sync & Share (per user) - Service Provider storage

Addition of "Microsoft 365 shared seats" usage metric in the Client area

Removed non-billable metrics from the Admin area:

Per workload: Workstations (included features)

Per GB: Workstations (included features)

Per workload: Servers (included features)

Per GB: Servers (included features)

Per workload: Virtual machines (included features)

Per GB: Virtual machines (included features)

Per workload: Web hosting servers (included features)

Per GB: Web hosting servers (included features)

Per workload: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud - Hybrid storage

Per workload: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud - Partner storage

Per user: Acronis Cyber Files Cloud - Hybrid storage

Improvement in the Admin area that merges advanced packs metrics in order to avoid redundant information.

Acronis product configuration in WHMCS

Improvement that allows copy-pasting API Client credentials from the clipboard (after copied from the Acronis Cyber Cloud Management portal). This capability only works when using HTTPS protocol.

Updates in configurable items' naming to match billing metrics.

Updates in the Client and Admin areas to match Cyber Platform naming conventions.

Improvement in the service template management, the following was added:

Support for management and security settings' edit in already created templates.

Support upgrade between templates with different management and security settings.

Support upgrade to a template when the tenant's management or security settings have been modified in the Acronis Cyber platform.

Client area improvements

Improvement that displays the PAYG items currently in use

Known limitations

Known limitations are listed in https://kb.acronis.com/content/70919.

What's new: With this update, the Acronis Cyber Cloud module for WHMCS brings support for Acronis Cyber Protect editions and offering items.

Support for Acronis Cyber Cloud 9.0. New editions:

Cyber Protect - Standard

Cyber Protect - Advanced

Cyber Protect - Disaster Recovery

Improved appearance of the Acronis Cyber Cloud add-on in WHMCS platform

Usability improvements:

Templates wizard: The customer-type tenant is selected as the default for new templates

Servers wizard: URL format is accepted now for datacenter hostname

Documentation updated

Note: Upgrade to 2.1.0-138 is supported from the following versions:

• Acronis Backup Cloud Provisioning Module v1: build 1.0.177

If you use the older build of 1.0 version, please upgrade to 1.0.177 first.

You can download it here: https://download.acronis.com/ci/whmcs/AcronisModulesForWHMCS-build-177.zip

• Acronis Cyber Cloud v2: build 2.0.127 or later

If you use the older build of 2.0 version, please upgrade to 2.0.127 first.

You can download it here: https://download.acronis.com/ci/whmcs/AcronisModulesForWHMCS-2.0.0-127.zip

Fixed issues:

The module catches "ProductDelete" events for the 3rd-party products and blocks them

Note: Upgrade to 2.0.118 version is supported only from 1.0.177 or later versions. If you use the older version, please upgrade to 1.0.177 first.

You can download it here: https://download.acronis.com/ci/whmcs/AcronisModulesForWHMCS-build-177.zip

New features:

Support for Acronis Cyber Cloud 8.0

Editions Support

Standard

Advanced

Disaster Recovery

Applications Support

Backup & Disaster Recovery

File Sync & Share

Physical Data Shipping

Notary

Cyber Infrastructure SPLA

New architecture: the new version consists of Addon and Provisioning module

Templates implemented: they were designed to combine the following settings for the product

Associated server

Tenant type: Customer or Partner

Set of available applications

Specific editions

Quotas

New service page in the Client area that allows client to check the service status, resource usage and manage notifications

New Configurable Options wizard that help to speed up and simplify the creation of Configurable Options Groups

Ability to enable Module Log for Acronis Cyber Cloud module

Ability to enable quotas overage (system-wide setting)

New languages supported:

Chinese (zh_TW)

Czech (cs_CZ)

Norwegian (no_NO)

Swedish (sv_SE)

Seamless migration from the previous module v1.0

New improved documentation prepared

Source code of the plugin was published on github under MIT license

Download link: https://download.acronis.com/ci/whmcs/AcronisModulesForWHMCS-2.0.0-116.zip

Note: Upgrade to 2.0.116 version is supported only from 1.0.177. If you use the older version, please upgrade to 1.0.177 first.

You can download it here: https://download.acronis.com/ci/whmcs/AcronisModulesForWHMCS-build-177.zip
